Package cloudsim.ext.datacenter

Class Summary
ActiveVmLoadBalancer ActiveVmLoadBalancer load balances the tasks among available VM's in a way to even out the number of active tasks at any given time on each VM.
DatacenterController DataCenterController is responsible for managing a single Data Center (DataCenter).
RoundRobinVmLoadBalancer This class implements VmLoadBalancer with a Round Robin policy.
ThrottledVmLoadBalancer This class implements VmLoadBalancer as a Throttled load balancer.
VmLoadBalancer This is the base class defining the behaviour of a Virtual Machine load balancer used by a DatacenterController.
 

Enum Summary
VirtualMachineState
